column4: Does anyone here have cedega working on a ubuntu amd64 install?
i have cedega on 64bit
i found this walkthrough, and it tells me to "Download transgaming*.deb into your home directory." <- what file is that? Do I really need it?
you don't need it
ok. would you like to help me tomorrow when i have cedega4-4-1?

I have to turn to mean means to get cedega :/ I live in Norway and don't possess a legal VISA to get an account on transgaming.org :/ I have money for it and I would gladly pay, but I can't. Is there any way you want to send it to me instead of me having to download it as torrent? :))
err. my VISA is legal, but its VISA electron which can't be used for shopping online
its slow :/ 0.07KB/s-slow..
it was fast when i downloaded it
ok.
Did you use a walkthrough? Could you point me to it?
wait a couple of minutes, and i will give you direct link
you rule more than anything has ever ruled before
did you use a walkthrough on the web to get cedega to work?
yes
do you remember the url? And btw, the file, did you forget it or should I do other things? :-) I don't mean to nag
i don't remember it, i always google for it
do you remember the words you used? is it "http://digital-conquest.ath.cx/wiki/index.php/Ubuntu#How_to_install_Cedega_on_AMD64"?
ok
you just skipped the transgaming* .deb part?
yes
thanks man
